name: FROG SOULS (itch)
description:
Free for a limited time ;) 

A sword wielding frog awakens to a Mysterious Being setting him on a quest: defeat the Four Masters of the infinite pond dimensions.The journey there will not be simple. Answers will not come easily. 

Frog Souls features simple game-play with high challenge and replay-ability. Jump and attack with timing to overcome each duel. Upgrade your character each run. Collect the souls of fallen frogs for rewards.... There are lots of little secrets and rare encounters to explore, so you'll need to do a little digging to reach the game's final cut scene ;)

Download includes original soundtrack !

Featuring 
- Hours of varying gameplay and secrets
- Cool hats, weapons, and powerups! Customise your character
- Die / retry! Keep your powerups and items as long as you have life
- 33 unique enemies, 4 story bosses and 4 hidden bosses, memorize all the attacks to survive
- Side Quests, secrets, rare items - Discover an infinite hunting portal
- Original soundtrack and SFX
- Equip rings to change gameplay, unlock new areas and abilities...
- Find friends to fight alongside you

*Windows Version only
